string_table.string: Use your arrow keys to move around the 360 degree image. Press the tab key to jump to interactive markers and hotspots.

slidelink.displaytext: Chapter Three, Looking up a Patient Record
Adding a Patient to a Waiting List
Chapter Eight, Recording Consultation Notes Using Clinical Templates
Chapter Nine, Recording Consultation Notes using Care Plans
Performing a Care Plan in Detail
Chapter Ten, Saving your Event Details
Chapter Eleven, Recording a ‘Did Not Attend’ (DNA)
Chapter Fourteen, Final Assessment and Summary

slidetranscripts.slidetranscript: <Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Here we can see an overview for the interface used throughout this eLearning. Make yourself comfortable and familiarise yourself with the functionality of the eLearning by clicking on the ‘i’ icons to reveal information here." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="This course will consist of the following fourteen chapters:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter One, Logging on
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter Two, SystmOne Overview
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter Three, Looking up a Patient Record
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter Four, The ‘Clinical Tree’
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter Five, Caseloads
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter Six, Waiting Lists
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter Seven, Appointments
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter Eight, Recording Consultation Notes using Clinical Templates
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter Nine, Recording Consultation Notes using Care Plans
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter Ten, The Save Screen
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter Eleven, Recording a ‘Did Not Attend’ (DNA)
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter Twelve, ‘Clinical Tree’ Extras
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter Thirteen, ‘Tasks’
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Chapter Fourteen, Final Assessment and Summary" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#BABBBA" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="By the end of this course, you should:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#BABBBA" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#BABBBA" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Be familiar with the key elements of the patient record,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#BABBBA" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Know how to access your caseloads and waiting lists,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#BABBBA" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Understand how to access and book your appointments,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#BABBBA" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Be able to perform a consultation for a patient utilising clinical templates and care plans,
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#BABBBA" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Understand the procedure that needs to be followed if the patient does not attend the appointment, and
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Multiple" LineSpacing="21" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="8"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Be able to access and update your ‘Tasks’ as well as create new ones to send to colleagues." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="This course has been designed for staff using SystmOne for the first time in their job roles. This training course does not require any prior knowledge of the system and will cover SystmOne for use by community staff visiting patients at their residences. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="This course will end with the completion of a final assessment covering the topics in this course. Upon scoring a pass grade of at least 80% you will gain access to the system. Be sure to take regular screen breaks throughout this training." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="SystmOne links to the NHS national spine, which joins together over 28,000 healthcare IT systems in 21,000 organisations. It provides secure access to over 65 million summary care records and over 90 million demographic records. This information is provided whenever a patient uses a GP surgery and is shared nationally between 500,000 health professionals a day. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Patients using SystmOne across the country will automatically be sharing their demographic information and it is this data that feeds into SystmOne. A patient can however ask specifically for their record not to be shared outside of the Trust." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Chapter One, Logging on" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="When you first receive your Smartcard it will be locked. A Smartcard administrator will be able to unlock your Smartcard and help you set a password of your choosing. There should be a Smartcard administrator at each NCH&C site. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="When you have been through this unlocking process, you can access SystmOne by inserting the Smartcard into a Smartcard reader. If you are using a laptop there should be a small slot on the side of the device for this. If you are using a desktop machine you should find either an external USB reader or the reader might be built into the keyboard itself.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" ListLevel="0" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="You can find a list of Smartcard administrators following this link: https://theloop.nchc.nhs.uk/download.cfm?ver=3124" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="As a community clinician, you will be assisted by one of the Trust's 4 admin hubs, they will carry out a variety of tasks for you, including sending letters, making calls and booking appointments.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Here is a guide to the locations of the hubs, depending on the area you cover:
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="North Norfolk Community Services - North Walsham Memorial Hospital
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="West Norfolk Community Services - St. James Clinic, King's Lynn
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Norwich Community Services - Norwich Community Hospital (NCH)
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="South Norfolk Community Services - Wymondham Health Centre
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Patients come into the service via a referral to these Admin Hubs. These referrals go through the following process: 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="New referral – Hub – Entered on SystmOne – Triaged – Appointment made – Clinician to view appointment ledger - Initial visit made by clinician." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Chapter Two, SystmOne Overview" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="When we are logged onto SystmOne the first screen we see is the SystmOne home screen. Don't be overwhelmed by the number of icons in SystmOne. You may have noticed certain icons are greyed out. This does not mean we cannot use them, it is just because we do not currently have a patient record open.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="At the very top of the screen you can see which unit you are logged into. Here we have highlighted the main icons you will use; we will briefly look at these during this chapter, and we will examine them in more detail throughout the course. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="When using SystmOne there are three extremely useful F Key shortcuts on your keyboard. It is worth making a note of these as they can be applied to many scenarios and can help reach important areas of the software. Firstly the F1 Key launches the help screen, this can provide you with more information around the software interface and demonstrates best practices when using different functions of the software.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The F11 Key can be used to lock your SystmOne screen. This is useful for locking confidential patient information to ensure that no private data is available to any onlookers.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The F8 key can be used to take you back to the homescreen, which we covered on the previous slide. This can be useful while in another window using a different tool in SystmOne and makes it easier to navigate back.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="The options that you use the most can be found at the top of the screen, along what we refer to as the large icon toolbar. Let’s take a look at some important ones.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text=" 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Firstly, this is the search icon and launches a quick ‘Patient Search’ window. This is the easiest way to search for a patient record. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The ‘Task’ icon is used to create a ‘Task’ for yourself, a colleague or a group of individuals. After entering the details of the ‘Task’, we can then send the task to allocate care for a patient, or set up a ‘Reminder’ for yourself." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The Guides icon takes you through to a section on the Trust's intranet that contains all the guides for SystmOne. These guides have been written by the trainers in the Trust and are probably your best method of getting help or checking the best practices for a process in SystmOne. Take the time to look at these guides if you are ever unsure of something and these are updated regularly by the team. These guides can also be accessed outside of SystmOne on the Trust’s intranet.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Web link: https://theloop.nchc.nhs.uk/guides-videos " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The Waiting list icon allows you to view the waiting lists that have been setup for your unit. You will be able to view which patients are on a particular list." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The Caseload icon is used to view the caseloads that have been setup for your unit. Caseloads can be used to assign work to a particular team or individual. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The Appointments icon takes you through to the appointment ledger. This enables you to view and if necessary, book your upcoming appointments. As with the other icons covered here, we will go over this in more detail in a later chapter." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The IM, or instant message icon will give you a list of individuals who are currently logged into your unit. You can use this list to instantly send a message to someone. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="It should be noted however, that these messages are not confidential and if required can be accessed by an audit of the system. Colleagues will appear with a face icon alongside their name if they are currently in a consultation and it is recommended not to message them if they are. These instant messages will pop up in the bottom right hand corner of the screen when they’re received." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Chapter Three, Looking up a Patient Record" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Patient records are stored, updated and used throughout SystmOne, in this chapter we will look at searching for a patient record. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="We begin by clicking on the search button which will bring up the ‘Patient Search’ menu. Here we can search for an individual using either the patient’s name or it is possible to type the patient’s NHS number or date of birth into this box. This follows the format of forename and surname. We can also search using the first 3 letters of the forename and surname. When you type in the details and click ‘Search’ the patient’s details will appear on the screen. It is worth double checking that you have the correct patient record at this point as people can share the same name. To do this, check that the postcode, date of birth and NHS number match.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="You will need to adhere to information governance while looking up patient records and this should of course be kept strictly confidential. Be aware of looking up friends and family as every record you go into will be logged to your Smartcard and shouldn’t be abused.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="To enter the patient record double click on the ‘Patient Search’ result." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="This is the patient record screen and a screen you will quickly become familiar with as you will be using it regularly. Everything on this screen will be related to the patient we have selected. In the top right hand corner of the screen we have what is known as the ‘Demographics Box’. This displays the patient information for the record you have open. If you hover over this box, more information will pop out for the patient, including which GP practice the patient is registered at.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="There are icons displayed in the ‘Demographics Box’ here which can indicate different points, the first shows that this patient is at risk of dementia and again can be viewed in more detail by hovering over the icon. Hovering is used widely in SystmOne and if in doubt, hovering will usually give you more information on a patient field or icon. The second shows that he is a non smoker. The next, that he is withholding some data due to sharing rules, and finally that the patient record contains ‘Special Notes’ which are confidential notes to be aware of whilst dealing with this patient. There are other icons that can be associated with patients and hovering will let you know what these are." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="When you have more than one patient record open at a time the ‘Demographics Box’ will have a bold red border, you may switch between the patient records by right clicking here and selecting the record you wish to view. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="If we return to the home screen with F8 while there is a patient record open, the home screen will display the patient information in the upper right hand corner. To return from this screen back to the patient record screen we can simply click on the information here.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Sometimes whilst doing a search you will notice that the ‘Patient Search’ result is greyed out and you may also notice a small black cross. Hovering over this will display a ‘deducted on’ date, this is what we call a deducted patient. A deducted patient is a patient who was being cared for by our service in the past but has now been discharged from our care.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="On occasion you may have a justifiable reason for accessing a deducted patient’s record. To do this you can access the record in the method previously described. Just be aware that if the patient has been deducted for more than 52 weeks the system will display a privacy alert box. You then need to type into the box the reason you are accessing this patient record.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Chapter Four, The ‘Clinical Tree’" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="We briefly described the ‘Clinical Tree’ in the last chapter, this is where many sections relating to a patient record are stored. You will not use all of these sections so we will go over some of the more commonly used sections in this chapter.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Aside from the ‘Patient Home’ section, another of the most widely used sections will be the ‘Tabbed Journal’. This contains all the clinical information; when consultations are recorded they automatically get inserted here into the journal. There can be a lot of information recorded here in chronological order, with the newest information being held at the bottom of the screen and you can scroll to see more. Everything has a date allocated to it, and the name and job role of the person who recorded the information. You can read all this information on the patient,but it can often be confusing for a general overview if the patient has received a lot of care from us in the past.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="There are different tabs at the top of this screen which, when selected will separate the information viewed. This can be from everything to just local data; which will filter to information relevant to your Trust unit only. This makes reading a large ‘Tabbed Journal’ easier and more relevant.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="We briefly mentioned ‘Special Notes’ earlier which are indicated by icons on the patient record. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="These are hidden from the ‘Patient Home’ screen due to their confidential nature. We can read the ‘Special Notes’ when we select them through the ‘Clinical Tree’. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="The ‘Special Notes’ here read ‘key code is 1234’ and ‘please don’t pass info onto his son’ as examples of the kind of information that may be relevant to this section. A new note can be added here by yourself by right clicking and selecting ‘Create Note’ here for colleagues to see on future visits. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="You can add a more general ‘Quick Note’ for the patient record by clicking on the note icon along the top from the search icon. This will pop out a window and you may fill out and leave a quick note in text for colleagues." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The core information section is good for a quick overview of the patient as it combines several sections for the patient into one. This concise overview is useful for checking whether the patient is on any medication and at the bottom of the screen to the right it records the last five consultations taken for the patient. We recommend you to view this section before recording you own consultations with the patient as it can be very useful. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="When exiting the patient record you will need to either ‘save’ or ‘discard’. These options are available along the top of the screen.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="‘Discard’ is useful if you make a mistake, it allows you to exit the patient record without saving the changes.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="‘Save’ is used to save any information that you have recorded into the patient record. For example, you will use this option after recording your consultation notes.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Our information governance team have also advised that if you should access a patient record to check anything about the patient, it is recommended that you record a quick note at the top of the screen. In the subsequent box that appears you will need to type in your reason for accessing the record. After this information has been recorded you can then click on save. The reason for recording the note is due to GDPR rules; patients can potentially request to know who has been accessing their record and why.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Saving the record will bring up the following ‘event details’ screen. In the scenario described above, make sure the event is marked as an ‘admin event’ and simply click ‘OK’. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="However when recording our consultation, we will need to mark the event as ‘clinically relevant’ and spend time completing this screen. This is something we will cover later in the training.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="If you wish to leave a patient record without making any changes, you will need to click on the ‘discard’ icon. This will give you a prompt if you have made any changes which will be lost before closing. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Chapter Five, Caseloads" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="When a patient first comes into the care of our service, a referral will be logged on the patient record. This is something that will be carried out by either the admin team in the hub, or an admin member in your team. When logging the referral, it is likely that the admin team will put the patient onto a waiting list and assign them to a particular caseload. We will look at both of these options next…" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Caseloads can be described as a way of assigning work to a team or individual. We can access this by clicking on the caseloads icon. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Whilst on the caseloads screen, we can see that there are teams on the left-hand side of the screen. These teams can be separated into specific specialties. For example, we have a community foot health team and a central team that have been split into specific sub-teams.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="The numbers in brackets beside the teams indicate how many patients have been assigned to that caseload. Selecting a specific caseload on the left, will show you a list of patients on the right." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="You can reorder the list by clicking on the column headings. For example, clicking on the surname column would order the list alphabetically according to the patient’s surnames.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="We can also move patients from one caseload to another. To do this we can highlight one of the patients and then click on the ‘reassign caseload holder’ button which brings up another screen. Here you can select the team and caseload you would like to reassign the patient to and click to confirm. This always checks with you whether the details are correct and then the patient has been moved.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Caseloads also provide a convenient method of accessing the patient record. To do this, right click on a specific patient in the list and select ‘Retrieve Patient’. This can be done from most sections of SystmOne by right clicking on a patient’s information and makes it easy to access their record from other menus.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="It is good to remember that caseloads are essentially a way of distributing work." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Chapter Six, Waiting Lists" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="As previously mentioned, after the referral has been logged by the admin staff they will add the patient to an ‘awaiting triage’ waiting list.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="To access the waiting list we will select the waiting list icon shown here and then enter the waiting list screen. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="The waiting list screen splits the content between the top and bottom of the screen. On the top of the screen we can see different categories of waiting lists, and below the details of the patients and their demographic information, how long they have been waiting and a due date for their next appointment.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="6" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="The way the patients are displayed here can indicate different information, if the patient text is in regular black this indicates that they are neither near to, or have exceeded their due date. When displayed in bold text, this indicates that they are a within a week of their allocated due date and finally when displayed in bold red text this indicates that they have passed their due date without an appointment." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="You can add a patient to a waiting list by first highlighting the list by clicking on it and then using the ‘add patient’ button below. Then you may either search for a patient to add or if you have a patient record open, this patient will be added. After this we can set a due date, priority for the patient and any additional notes then click ‘OK’. This is something the triage team will usually do but it is useful to know this process.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Chapter Seven, The Appointment Ledger" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="The appointments screen can be accessed by clicking on the appointments button on SystmOne. This will bring you into the appointments screen which looks like a calendar similar to those used on email systems, the main difference being that nothing is private and this is shared between colleagues. You will be able to see a list of colleagues to the left of the screen and you may tick these to display their calendars on screen to the right. The next time you access this screen it will default to show you the last names that were ticked here, you can click through on the small calendar display to get to different days.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="This will be one of your most visited SystmOne screens as you will view your appointments and see what the hub has booked in for you here." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Most of your appointments should be booked by the triage team in the hub. However, should you need to book in an appointment yourself, this can be achieved by right clicking on an empty slot. A menu will appear, select the option ‘book appointment’. If you don’t have a patient record open you will be prompted to search for the patient. When the search box appears it will default to listing the last person you performed a search for.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Once you click ‘OK’ you will then get another window asking if the appointment is for one of the patient’s referrals here. Select ‘yes’. You will need to select the relevant referral and click ‘OK’ again. " /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="None of the fields on this final screen are mandatory. But it is worthwhile being aware of the following options
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Duration – allows you to make the appointment longer by giving the patient more slots.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Details – can be used to add extra information to the appointment. This is a free text field and can be used record anything that is required but some examples might be ‘initial visit’ or ‘take extra dressings’.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Flag – at the bottom of the windows you will find some flags. These can be set by simply ticking the relevant box to indicate if this is an emergency/rebooked appointment etc.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="After clicking ‘OK’ if the patient is currently on a waiting list you should receive a prompt asking you if you wish to remove them from the list.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="This appointment has now been added to the calendar and as we had flagged this as an emergency, we can see the red line over the appointment here to indicate this. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="The circle icons at the bottom of the screen here are indicators for reception staff to sign that a patient has arrived and for appointments booked. After booking this patient’s appointment you will see that we can now see a 1 in the circle for ‘appointments booked’ when hovering over we can see which patient is booked.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="If your patient is attending a clinic, upon arrival the receptionist might assist you by right clicking on the appointment and marking the patient as arrived. This changes the magenta circle which now contains a 1 to indicate to you and other members of staff that the patient has arrived for their appointment.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Right clicking on the appointment will give us the option for ‘consultation’. This is an important step and is used to record our consultation notes with a patient. Once clicked it will take us into the patient record. We will now be in consultation mode. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style /> <Span Text="Chapter Eight, Recording Consultation Notes Using Clinical Templates" /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="When in the patient record you will find some blue boxes at the top of the screen. We call these the HEDP boxes. (History. Examination. Diagnosis. Plan)
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Rather than using these boxes most services complete their consultation by using Clinical Templates or Care Plans.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="The clinical templates can be found in our ‘Clinical Tree’. Some of these may be greyed out. This simply indicates that no previous values have been recorded.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="When filling out a template you will notice that all templates adhere to a similar format. We will demonstrate this process by using some specific templates as examples." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="If we simply select the waterlow template in our ‘Clinical Tree’ we will see previous values that have been recorded into the template on the right-hand side of the screen. You could also find this information from the ‘Tabbed Journal’. Although remember the ‘Tabbed Journal’ will contain all the clinical information, so to find specifically just the waterlow information would involve a lot of scrolling up and down in most cases.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="To record new values into our waterlow template we will need to double click it. This will cause the template to open in a new window.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="All templates will have one or more sections or tabs at the top of the template. Some templates can have more than others. We will take you through each of the tabs on this waterlow template.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="When recording values into a template there will be different methods of inputting that information.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Sometimes you might be expected to select options from a drop-down list. An example of this can be seen on this first tab. Gradually as more options are selected a waterlow score is automatically generated below on this particular template. If previous values have been recorded, you will see this information on the right-hand side of the template." /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="On the second tab (SSKIN), rather than selecting from drop-downs you will need to record information by typing into the boxes on screen. Whilst you can simply free text into the boxes you might find it useful to make use of preset notes. These can be accessed by clicking the following icon.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Preset notes just save you a bit of work. The items that you select will be inserted into the box for you. More information can then be added to the end of the text as required.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="On the third tab (Giving Information) you have another example of a free text box, pressure care advice. This also demonstrates the benefits of preset notes, as clicking on this option provides us with all the choices we need.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="The final tab on the template (v 0.3) is there for information purposes only. There is nothing we need to record here. It is used to find out information such as :-
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Current version number
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="Who approved the template
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="When the next planned review date is
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="After you have finished recording information into the template click ‘OK’.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="As previously mentioned, the information we have just recorded can be found by both selecting the waterlow template specifically or finding the information in the ‘Tabbed Journal’.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style /> </Block> </Content> </Document>

<Document xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <Content> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="The next clinical template we will look at is the ‘holistic template’. This template is more complicated than our ‘waterlow template’ but the same principles apply.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="As we did previously, double click the template in order to start recording new information. 
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="The first tab involves recording information via selecting from drop-downs and typing into free text boxes. You can also use preset notes as we did earlier to help populate these text boxes.
" /> </Block> <Block> <Style FlowDirection="LeftToRight" LeadingMargin="0" TrailingMargin="0" FirstLineMargin="0" Justification="Left" LineSpacingRule="Single" LineSpacing="20" SpacingBefore="0" SpacingAfter="0"> <ListStyle ListType="None" ListTypeFormat="Parentheses" Color="#000000" BulletFont="Arial" /> </Style> <Span Text="
